notes_translated.fr:
La Direction de la recherche est chargée de l'élaboration et du transfert de la recherche appliquée et de l'information en vue de favoriser la santé et le mieux-être des anciens combattants, des membres des Forces canadiennes et des leurs familles, ainsi que des membres de la GRC.

Nota : Les rapports de recherche appliquée sur la santé sont habituellement publiés dans la langue dans laquelle ils ont été rédigés. Les décideurs et les responsables des politiques les consultent pour faciliter l'application et l'échange de connaissances et les aider à prendre des décisions fondées sur des preuves. Tous les sommaires de recherche, le cas échéant, ont été traduits.
notes_translated.en:
The Research Directorate is responsible for the development and transfer of applied research and information in support of the health and well-being of Veterans, Canadian Forces members and their families, and members of the RCMP.

Please note that applied health research is generally only available in the language in which it was originally prepared. These reports have been made available to policy and decision makers to facilitate improved uptake and knowledge exchange, and to aid in the process of evidence-based decision making. All research summaries, where available, have been translated.

The Research Directorate is responsible for the development and transfer of applied research and information in support of the health and well-being of Veterans, Canadian Forces members and their families, and members of the RCMP.

Please note that applied health research is generally only available in the language in which it was originally prepared. These reports have been made available to policy and decision makers to facilitate improved uptake and knowledge exchange, and to aid in the process of evidence-based decision making. All research summaries, where available, have been translated.
